#summary Different clock formats.
#labels Phase-Design

= Introduction =
Each epiClock can be one of the following types of formats. To set an epiClock to one of the provided formats, pass in `{format: '<Format Code>'}` as part of the settings argument when creating a [dev_obj_clock Clock Object].

|| *Format* || *Format Code* || *Description* ||
|| Meridian Time || M || A 12 hour day, either Ante or Post Meridian. 13:00 hours would be displayed as 1:00 PM ||
|| Military Time || I || A 24 hour day. 1:00 PM would be displayed as 13:00 hours ||
